tool.name: Identification Parameters
tool.description: Sets the identification parameters to be used in SearchGUI and PeptideShaker apps

param.name: fixed_modifications

param.help: Occurs in known places on peptide sequence. Hold the appropriate key while clicking to select multiple items

param.name: variable_modifications

**What it does**
Creates a parameters file (.par) which can be used independently by SearchGUI or PeptideShaker apps.
A FASTA file with decoy sequences generated by FastaCLI is recommended if SearchGUI and PeptideShaker are going to use the output of this tool.
